dict.string: Developed and supported multiple web and iOS applications using Java/Objective C. Technical lead for H­E­B’s customer facing mobile application currently developed for iOS and Android systems.

array.string: Worked on front end enhancements to H­E­B’s Own Brand Review web application that allows H­E­B partners to review over 18,000 products.
Part of a team that develop front end web application for application authorization system that controlled over 30 H­E­B internal systems.

Developed that main component for deal creation between H­E­B and vendors. Developed back end services using Java and Axis 2 for H­E­B’s Deals and Cost’s “Deal Builder” feature. This allowed over a 1,000 vendors to create and manage deals for over 46,000 products.

One of the core mobile developer on H­E­B’s Enterprise mobile launch to over 300 H­E­B stores. Released five initial applications dealing with sales reporting, submitting help desk tickets, employee hour tracking, and single sign on. Also supported and developed enhancements to these applications.
Built a prototype mobile application called Virtual Shopper that allowed over 5,000 corporate employees to scan for items and have their order delivered to them at work.

Lead a team of ten iOS and Android developers in creating H­E­B’s first public facing mobile application. The application allows users to search for store locations, view weekly ad information, gain access to store’s product catalog, sign up use H­E­B’s digital coupon program, manage and refill pharmacy prescriptions, create and maintain a digital shopping list, and pay using your H­E­B Mobile Wallet.
Mentored junior developers in their technical and personal skills.

dict.string: Worked with a team building a new financial system for the USDA. I used classical and Object Oriented ABAP language to create conversion programs that would take financial data and convert it to their new SAP financial system.

array.string: Exposure to and help implement different software testing techniques (Unit and System Testing) within the SAP system.
Wrote several Technical Design solution documents
